unbindBuilding(VisualBuildingTemplate) - Method in class downfall.ui.editor.BuildingsEditorController
removes all bindings from a Building Template
unbindMaterial(VisualMaterialTemplate) - Method in class downfall.ui.editor.MaterialsEditorController
Unbinds the properties of a given materials from all TextFields and CheckBoxes.
unbindTag(Tag) - Method in class downfall.ui.editor.TagsEditorController
Binds the properties of a given tag to all TextFields and CheckBoxes.
update() - Method in class downfall.ui.main.DownfallMainController
Executes general update sequence for all scene elements.
update() - Method in class downfall.ui.main.tabs.RealmScreenController
Updates values on all labels if there was an action or an event that could have changed them.
updateGFX() - Method in class downfall.realm.template.VisualBuildingTemplate
Updates the Image representation building to comply with the current value of pathToGFXProperty
updateGFX() - Method in class downfall.realm.template.VisualMaterialTemplate
Updates the Image representation material to comply with the current value of pathToGFXProperty
updateImageView(Pane, Image, ImageView) - Method in class downfall.ui.main.tabs.RealmScreenController
Updates the given ImageView to contain the given Image, if image provided is not null, forces the width of the container to conform to the ImageView's Image width modified so that the image keeps its aspect ratio, plus some gaps that are defined in IMAGE_PANE_GAP.
updateRealmTab() - Method in class downfall.ui.main.DownfallMainController
Forces an upgrade on Realm Tab
updateStabilityBar() - Method in class downfall.ui.main.tabs.RealmScreenController
Updates the Stability bar to display the current stability in a visual way.
updateStabilityPane(Pane, BackgroundFill, BackgroundFill, Double, Boolean) - Method in class downfall.ui.main.tabs.RealmScreenController
Binds the background property to a new Background that is created with one of the two fills depending on whether the Stability of the realm "exceeds" the threshold given.
updateTabs() - Method in class downfall.ui.main.DownfallMainController
Forces an update on all tabs.
